column5: Freshly remodeled 1 bed 1 bath condo steps from the beach! This is the closest unit to the beach in the entire Beach Club complex and also on the third floor so it has the BEST views! New floors, new countertops, new windstorm certified french patio doors with impact glass, beach theme, all it needs is you!
column8: 'Dune our Thing' w/ BIG BEACH VIEWS
